title: The Canyon Encounter: The Adventures of a Crazy, Self Taught Woodsman
description: *This is a 9500 word true life short story.Once I believed I knew all there was to know about the creatures who roamed the Pacific Northwest forests. After spending long stretches of time alone out in the timber, a few strange experiences started eroding that conviction. This story is about some of those events leading up to a solo hunting trip out in an Oregon wilderness area. My know-it-all perception shattered then after a mysterious encounter with an unknown creature deep in a canyon. The experience changed me forever.The timber holds mysteries Iâ€™ve yet to solve.
author: C.M. Connelly
